title: The bak'd bully: or, Love in an oven [B]eing a true relation of a gentleman that pickt up a bakers wife: how she carried him home to her house, and of his entertainment there. To the tune of, Jenny come tie my, &c. With allowance.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden Ball, near the Hospital-gate, in West-smith-field,
